sentences.english: Want to check to bughouse regularly here.
sentences.chinese: 此间要定期到精神病院复查。

sentences.english: A British hospital says a mother in Northern Irelandhas given birth to sextuplets.
sentences.chinese: 英国一家病院称，一位北爱尔兰妇女生下六胞胎。

sentences.english: Computer-based Patient Record (CPR) is the trend of hospital information system.
sentences.chinese: 电子病历是病院信息体系的发铺趋势。

sentences.english: I've grown up wandering the wards of Broadmoor.
sentences.chinese: 我是在布罗德莫精神病院的病房里长大的。

sentences.english: Incident is collected at archives of punishment detect top-secret " bughouse talks about Guizhou mountain quite " .
sentences.chinese: 事件收录于刑侦绝密档案“黔岭精神病院怪谈”。

sentences.english: People are probably wondering what psychiatric ward I escaped from.
sentences.chinese: 人们可能会怀疑我是从哪个精神病院逃出来的。

sentences.english: The incapable man in cap went into the hospitable capital hospital.
sentences.chinese: 戴帽的无能男子走进热忱好客的首都病院。

sentences.english: As a consequence of being in hospital, Shelly decided that she wanted to become a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 由于在病院的缘故，谢莉决议当一名护士。

sentences.english: Yet there is an element of the madhouse in that explanation too.
sentences.chinese: 然而这个解释中却包含了精神病院要素。

sentences.english: Four days later, Ms. Jin’s sister was committed to the city’s psychiatric hospital.
sentences.chinese: 四天后，金的妹妹被关进了当地精神病院。

sentences.english: Before I went to the nuthouse, I had a job working in the zoo .
sentences.chinese: 其实去精神病院前，我还在动物园打过一份工。

sentences.english: West Park Mental hospital was built between 1912 and 1914.
sentences.chinese: 韦斯特公园精神病院建于1912至1914年。

sentences.english: Yet the resources devoted to them are much scantier than those offered in psychiatric hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 花费在这上面的费用要比精神病院的少得多。

sentences.english: Still outraged in the morning, he is committed to a psychiatric clinic.
sentences.chinese: 到了早上他依然是暴跳如雷，因而被送进精神病院。

sentences.english: Vrapce is where Zagreb's mental hospital is located.
sentences.chinese: 乌拉普采是萨格勒布一家精神病院的所在地。
不要一直说“这里是个精神病院”。”

definition: abbr. for 醫科大學|医科大学[yi1 ke1 da4 xue2], university of medicine
